description.message: Increment [+] a URL or go to the Next [>] URL; Supports Auto- and Download-Incrementing

title.description: Extension title (tool tip) shown when hovered.

setup_h3_label.message: Select the part of the URL to Increment [+] or Decrement [-]

auto_wait_label.message: Wait for the page to fully load

auto_badge_label.message: Show the times left in the icon badge

auto_eta_day.message: Over a Day (You sure about this?!)

selection_notalphanumeric_error.message: Selection can only contain alphanumeric characters

selection_notinurl_error.message: Selection has to be part of the URL

selection_toolarge_error.message: Selection is too large; please select a smaller number or fewer characters

selection_base_error.message: Select a higher base to match characters in selection

selectionstart_invalid_error.message: Selection position must be from URL

interval_invalid_error.message: Interval has to be between 1 and Max

error_skip_invalid_error.message: Error Skip has to be between 0 and 10

auto_next_prev_error.message: To use Next [>] Prev [<] with Auto, please first enable Enhanced Mode in Options to give URLI permissions

auto_times_invalid_error.message: Auto Times must be between 1 and 1000

auto_seconds_invalid_error.message: Auto Seconds must be between 1 and 3600

auto_eta_toohigh_error.message: Auto ETA needs to be less than 1 Day

download_enabled_error.message: Please first enable Download in Options to give URLI permissions

help_quick_shortcuts.message: If Quick is enabled, you can Increment [+] or perform other actions instantly without having to enter Setup

chrome_shortcuts_p1.message: URLI is currently set to use Chrome Shortcuts.

chrome_shortcuts_p2.message: Chrome Shortcuts support limited key combinations, but you can enable URLI's Internal Shortcuts instead to use any key you want!

internal_shortcuts_p.message: URLI is currently set to use its internal shortcuts. Click on the text boxes and press the key(s) you'd like to set. Alt, Ctrl, Shift, and Meta keys can be used. Left/Middle/Right Mouse Buttons can also be set as shortcuts.

icon_feedback_enable_label.message: Enable icon feedback when incrementing or from other actions

popup_open_setup_label.message: When Popup UI opens, automatically jump to URL Setup

popup_settings_can_overwrite_label.message: Allow Popup UI settings to overwrite these settings

increment_decrement_settings_p.message: Change the way URLI pre-selects the number to increment and other options. You can set a couple of these options in the Popup UI too.

selection_option_prefixes.message: Select numbers in the URL with prefixes like =123 and /456

selection_option_lastnumber.message: Select the last number in the URL

selection_option_firstnumber.message: Select the first number in the URL

selection_option_custom.message: Use a custom JavaScript regular expression

selection_custom_help_label.message: For more testing and help, use

selection_custom_matchgroup_error.message: Match found, but not in group entered

selection_custom_matchindex_error.message: Match found, but not in index entered

error_skip_description_p.message: URLI can check if the next URL will return an HTTP error code (like 404) and increment again, skipping it up to 10 times. Set it to 0 to disable it. Note that using this with Auto or UI Buttons requires Enhanced Mode.

next_prev_settings_p.message: Some URLs may not have numbers, so URLI can increment using Next Prev links on the page. To use Next Prev with Auto, enable Enhanced Mode below.

next_prev_links_priority_innerHTML_optio.message: Prefer links with inner HTML like "Next" in them

next_prev_popup_buttons_description_labe.message: Show Next Prev buttons (Requires Enhanced Permissions)

auto_settings_p.message: Relax and let URLI auto-increment! Start Auto anytime by toggling it in the Popup UI. Supports multiple tabs at the same time and pausing.

download_disable_p.message: This isn't just any downloader! Use it with Auto to create an Auto Incrementer Downloader! Click the button to enable (grant permissions).

download_enable_p.message: Download is now enabled! Start Download anytime by toggling it in the Popup UI.

enhanced_mode_enable_p.message: Enhanced Mode is now enabled! You can now use Next/Prev and Error Skipping with Auto and the Popup UI Buttons.

enhanced_mode_disable_p.message: Enhanced Mode lets you use both Next/Prev and Error Skipping with Auto and the Popup UI Buttons. Click the button to enable (grant permissions).

email_a.message: Contact (Please Send Feedback or Report Bugs)

urli_thank_you_rainbow.message: Thank you for using URLI, a URL Incrementer

urli_thank_you_wish.message: URLI loves incrementing for you and wishes you an Incrementful Day!

download_experimental_disclaimer.message: Download is still an experimental feature. Please only use it for small and simple downloading tasks while incrementing.
